title: Seattle City Council Transportation & Seattle Public Utilities Committee 9/19/23
description:
Agenda: Call to Order; Approval of the Agenda; Public Comment; CB 120657: relating to rates and charges for water services of Seattle Public Utilities; CB 120661: relating to Seattle Public Utilities - updating the Solid Waste Code; CB 120658: relating to sidewalk construction and pedestrian mobility improvements; CB 120642: relating to street and sidewalk use; Draft ordinance relating to tree protections; Appointments and reappointments to Seattle Freight Advisory Board, Seattle Transit Advisory Board, Seattle Bicycle Advisory Board, Seattle Pedestrian Advisory Board, Seattle School Traffic Safety Committee; Vision Zero Update; Adjournment.
